price: ចំណែកឯអ្នកដែលធ្វើអំពើអាក្រក់ សូម្បីមានទម្ងន់ប៉ុន លំអងធូលីក៏គេនឹងមើលឃើញវាដែរ។
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
